alert.note: Alert for Harper; Kingman; Sedgwick; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 3:11PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Sedgwick, eastern Harper, southeastern Kingman and Sumner Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 310 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Harper to near Wakita. Movement was northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, Haysville, Wellington, Park City, Bel Aire, Mulvane, Goddard, Clearwater, Anthony, Belle Plaine, Harper, Conway Springs, Caldwell, Oxford, Downtown Wichita, Kechi, Eastborough, Argonia and Norwich. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 13. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 3 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
